abstract: Researchers tested sleep-deprived subjects in driving simulators to explore the effectiveness of nap-and-coffee therapy.
snippet: Researchers tested sleep-deprived subjects in driving simulators to explore the effectiveness of nap-and-coffee therapy.

headline.main: Really? The Claim: For a More Restful Nap, Avoid Caffeine
headline.print_headline: Really? The Claim: For a more restful nap, drink a cup of coffee beforehand.
